data.title: Happy Feet Three/Credits
authors: Contributors to JH Movie Collection Wiki
data.meta_description: Full Credits for Happy Feet Three (2028) THREE THREE Directed by DEREK DRYMON GEORGE MILLER Written by GEORGE MILLER CONRAD VERNON DEREK DRYMON GREG TIERNAN Produced by DOUG MITCHELL GEORGE MILLER BILL MILLER Executive Producers Chris Defaria Philip Hearnsham Graham Burke and Bruce Berman...
data.text:
"Rhythm Nation"

©1989 Black Ice Publishing, Licensed & administered by

Australia Pty Ltd Produced by John Powell and Wade Robson

A Division of Sony Music Entertainment
